synonyms.synonym: Ral GEF with PH domain and SH3-binding motif 1

protein.general_function: Involved in guanyl-nucleotide exchange factor activity
protein.specific_function: May be involved in cytoskeletal organization. May also be involved in the stimulation of transcription in a Ras-independent fashion. Guanine nucleotide exchange factor for the small GTPase RALA

reference.reference_text: Rebhun JF, Chen H, Quilliam LA: Identification and characterization of a new family of guanine nucleotide exchange factors for the ras-related GTPase Ral. J Biol Chem. 2000 May 5;275(18):13406-10.
